title: Enforcer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- 3 times per game, learn the will of another player. They will be notified of this.
- You may transport another player to another location. If your target is attacked, you will fight their attacker and grant your target powerful defense.
- You may attack another player. If you kill another good player, you may no longer attack.
- Once per game, you may become an Improvised Hacker(Post 2174). You will retain all your attributes. Available N3 onwards.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you are jailed by any jailor-like role, you are still free to do your action. Town aligned jailors will learn your role at the end of the night.

desc:
Post 2168
*Sometimes destiny needs a literal push.*
